invalidValue.description: Report message when a property has an invalid value
invalidValue.message: Web app manifest should not have invalid value '$1' for property '$2'.

unsupportedValue.description: Report message when a property has an unsupported value
unsupportedValue.message: Web app manifest should not have unsupported value '$1' for property '$2'.

validJSON.description: Report message when the web app manifest is not a valid JSON
validJSON.message: Web app manifest should contain valid JSON.
